title.value: V2 Table Code System: Response Flag

description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts allowing the placer (sending) application to determine the amount of information to be returned from the filler. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the ORC segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0121 (Response Flag)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Same as E, also Replacement and Parent-Child

definition.value: Same as E, also Replacement and Parent-Child

display.value: Same as R, also other associated segments

definition.value: Same as R, also other associated segments

display.value: Same as D, plus confirmations explicitly

definition.value: Same as D, plus confirmations explicitly

display.value: Only the MSA segment is returned

definition.value: Only the MSA segment is returned
